name: 高等作業系統
description: 使同學瞭解作業系統的相關知識及Unix system call programming的技巧。
goals: Unix system call programming, Hadoop programming
syllabus:
下列為暫定教學主題，教學進度視課程情況調整。

*   Concepts of operating systems and system programming
*   Utility programs, subsystems, and multiple program systems
*   Processes, interprocess communication, and synchronization
*   Memory allocation, segmentation, and paging
*   Loading and linking libraries
*   Resource allocation, scheduling, and performance evaluation
*   I/O systems, storage devices, and file systems
*   Basic networking, protocols, and distributed file systems
*   Protection, security, and privacy
